full_text: How can you not be romantic about baseball ? Wish the video would've showed how loud we were chanting Freddie's name. Mark it down for another awesome Dodger Stadium memory....it's my favorite place in the world for a reason #AlwaysLA https://t.co/Mr8xV324Qc
Beer prices at Dodger Stadium actually went down.....I'm astonished.
Dodger Stadium gonna be rockin tomorrow #AlwaysLA
